text:
In the default publication, I can add a new language version to all pages, and
to new pages, but trying to add one to home (/index) gives the error:

>>>>
/usr/share/lenya/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/itp/config/tasks/targets.xml:215:
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DocumentTypeBuildException:
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DocumentTypeBuildException: No definition found
for doctype 'homepage'!
<<<<


This breaks home, and when I attempt to view the en or de version I get this error:


>>>>
Unable to get transformer handler for cocoon://lenya-page/itp/info/default.xml

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Unable to get transformer handler for
cocoon://lenya-page/itp/info/default.xml:
org.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorException: Exception in creating
Transform Handler
<<<<
